EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations! {!Account.Name} has been qualified for a PrePay Fleet One Edge Fuel Card with attached Pilot/Flying J Direct Bill (PFJ credit line is pending completion of PFJ paperwork).
Your welcome packet and new fuel cards should arrive via UPS within the next 2-4 days. Please note your New Account Setup Fee of $75 will be automatically drafted from your checking account within the next 1-4 business days.
The PFJ Credit Line is only usable at Pilot/Flying J locations for fuel purchases, oil/additives, and scales. The credit line (Direct Bill) will be added to these fuel cards once you have turned in their paperwork.
If you would like to use cash advances, moneycodes, or to fuel outside of Pilot/Flying J, you will need to Western Union or Wire Transfer funds into your new Fleet One account. Please wait until you have received your AR Number and instructions on how to make this transfer before funding your account. Prefunding your account is completely OPTIONAL and only needed if you want to take advantage of the above services in this paragraph.
